name: Munimal
short_description:
qt retheme of mumble for sane users.
----------------------------------------------------------------------
To install, unzip the munimal folder to /skins under where you have mumble installed.

Select the skin under:

Settings -> User Interface - Look and Feel

Restart Mumble.
